src:
Berbagi Kisah Jadi Entrepreneur, Putri Tanjung: Nggak Bisa Instan
07 Nov 2019, 09:13 by Herdi Alif Al Hikam


Foto: Herdi Alif Al Hikam/detikcom

Jakarta - CEO Creativepreneur Event Creator Putri Tanjung mengungkapkan kunci suksesnya dalam menjadi salah satu pengusaha kreatif alias creativepreneur di Indonesia. Menurutnya, sukses menjadi seorang cretivepreneur butuh proses yang panjang.Dia menyoroti sifat anak muda zaman sekarang yang kurang sabar dan maunya instan dalam memulai usaha. Padahal dalam menjalankan usaha membutuhkan proses yang tidak sebentar."Semua kan butuh proses ya, dan itu panjang. Sekarang ini anak muda maunya ini yang instan-instan aja, nggak bisa kita instan," kata Putri dalam konferensi pers acara Creativepreneur Corner 2019, di Menara BCA, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Dia menyatakan yang pertama harus dimiliki adalah mindset alias pola pikir creativepreneur. Dia pun mengatakan bahwa menjadi pengusaha adalah 'never ending marathon' alias lari yang tidak pernah berhenti."Aku sih jadi entrepreneur itu never ending marathon, bukan sprint sekali doang, tapi terus-terusan. Lalu terpenting adalah punya mindset, mindset jadi creativepreneur," ungkap Putri.Putri juga mengundang milenial Indonesia untuk datang dalam acara Creativepreneur Corner 2019. Acara ini akan diadakan di dua kota, yaitu Yogyakarta pada 16 November dan Bali pada 23 November 2019."Di sana kita itu ingin berbicara mengenai creativepreneur mindset. Apa, kapan, dan di mana, terus bagaimana punya mindset entrepreneurship," ucap Putri.Nantinya, ada banyak tokoh cretivepreneur yang jadi pembicara dan memberikan pengalaman serta tipsnya, mulai dari Anindya Bakrie, Deddy Corbuzier, Pangeran Siahaan, Ernest Prakasa, dan masih banyak lagi. Putri pun akan ikut menjadi pembicara."Pokoknya, ini sebuah talkshow yang dikemas secara santai. Datang talkshow kayak datang ke konser," ucap Putri. Simak Video "Jadi Entrepreneur di Usia Muda, Putri Tanjung: Nggak Bisa Instan"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ara/ara)
text:
Sharing the Story of Being an Entrepreneur, Putri Tanjung: Cannot be Instant
Nov 7 2019, 09:13 by Herdi Alif Al Hikam


Photo: Herdi Alif Al Hikam / detikcom

Jakarta - CEO of Creativepreneur Event Creator Putri Tanjung revealed the key to her success in becoming one of the creative entrepreneurs alias creativepreneur in Indonesia. According to him, success in becoming a cretive entrepreneur requires a long process. He highlights the nature of young people today who lack patience and want instant in starting a business. In fact, running a business requires a process that is not short-lived. "Everything needs a process, and it's long. Now young people want this to be an instant, we cannot do it instantly," Putri said in a press conference at the Creativepreneur Corner 2019, in Menara BCA, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019). He stated that the first thing to have is the mindset alias creativepreneur mindset. He also said that being an entrepreneur is a 'never ending marathon' aka running that never stops. "I still become an never ending marathon entrepreneur, not a single sprint, but constantly. Then the most important thing is to have a mindset, a mindset to be a creativepreneur," said Putri. Putri also invited Indonesian millennials to come to the 2019 Creativepreneur Corner event. The event will be held in two cities, namely Yogyakarta on November 16 and Bali on November 23, 2019. "There we want to talk about the creativepreneur mindset. What, when and where, then how to have an entrepreneurial mindset, "said Putri. Later, there are many cretive entrepreneurs who are speakers and give their experiences and tips, ranging from Anindya Bakrie, Deddy Corbuzier, Pangeran Siahaan, Ernest Prakasa, and many more. Putri will also be a speaker. "Anyway, this is a talk show that is casually packed. Talkshows come like coming to a concert," said Putri. Check out the video "Becoming an Entrepreneur at a Young Age, Putri Tanjung: Cannot be Instant" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (fig / fig)
